Services included, develpment, hosting and SEO using Google Analytics, Adwords etc.

work.summary: Jam3 is an innovative production company focusing on unique front-end experiences. Developers work with designers to create unique interactice experiences through web browsers and other mediums.

education.summary: Seneca college focuses on teaching the foundations of good programming techniques as well as an introduction to some of the most popular modern programming models like MVC and REST. The Computer Programming and Analysis program provides an opportunity to create complete solutions for common development challenges like implementing storefront applications and social media applications as well as more specialized tasks like parallelization.

The University of Waterloo Political Science program provides a strong foundation on the analysis of essential political theories and concepts, their application to real and historical events as well as providing a strong foundation for research and criticial thinking skills.
